name: HellGunner
description: The most important thing is that there are a lot of zombies around, and armed mercenaries. Pixel, hardcore and Action. Protect yourself and help ordinary people.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows  7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Core 2 Duo or higher Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 256 mb DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 450 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Core 2 Duo or higher Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 1024 mb DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 500 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
